item.title: By: Julian Woodward

item.description: <p>@3 - er, that'll be yet another 'unmissable' televisual entertainment that I've happily missed. <img alt="Emoticon" src="<a rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5N3GKD/$File/rolleyes.gif"</a> /> </p>

item.title: By: Chris Miller
item.dc:creator: Chris Miller
item.description: <p>I will take a peek when the test accounts open. Or I have an 8.5 server to run it on too</p>
item.content:encoded: I will take a peek when the test accounts open. Or I have an 8.5 server to run it on too

item.title: By: Julian Woodward
item.dc:creator: Julian Woodward
item.description: <p>Ooooh you're such a tease <img alt="Emoticon" src="<a rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLY/$File/smile.gif"</a> /><br /><br />I'm concerned to see that smelly dog farts only have a medium priority though (!)<br /><br />Perhaps you should publish a Redbook ... or an Elgujibook ... what colour is an elguji anyway?<br /><br />Seriously: looking forward to finding out more about this. And now, back to blogsphere silence.<br /></p>
item.content:encoded:
Ooooh you’re such a tease http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLY/$File/smile.gif“ />

I’m concerned to see that smelly dog farts only have a medium priority though (!)

Perhaps you should publish a Redbook … or an Elgujibook … what colour is an elguji anyway?

Seriously: looking forward to finding out more about this. And now, back to blogsphere silence.

item.title: By: Wild Bill
item.dc:creator: Wild Bill
item.description: <p>Amazing! And I do hope that the powers-that-be within Lotus appreciate how much work your putting in, creating a free awesome application that will encourage people to upgrade to 8.5.. !<br /><br /><img alt="Emoticon" src="<a rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLU/$File/wink.gif"</a> /><br /><br />--* Bill</p>
item.content:encoded:
Amazing! And I do hope that the powers-that-be within Lotus appreciate how much work your putting in, creating a free awesome application that will encourage people to upgrade to 8.5.. !

http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLU/$File/wink.gif“ />

–* Bill
